channel.title: CVE Feed for Tenable -- Nessus Network Monitor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tenable -- Nessus Network Monitor

item.title: CVE-2024-9158|2024-09-30T16:24:55.635Z -- tenable -- nessus%20network%20monitor
item.description: A stored cross site scripting vulnerability exists in Nessus Network Monitor where an authenticated, privileged local attacker could inject arbitrary code into the NNM UI via the local CLI.
